verses.text: 烏斯地有一個人，名叫約伯。這人完全、正直，敬畏 神，遠離罪惡。

words.note: 烏斯 is a transliteration, 地 means 'land'.
Verb-object compound meaning 'name called'.
In a spiritual sense, 'blameless'.
A common biblical term for reverential fear of God.
The space before 神 is a mark of reverence in Chinese Bibles.
A compound noun emphasizing both sin and wickedness.

verses.text: 他生了七男三女。

words.note: Verb ēn + aspect particle 了 indicating completed action.

verses.text: 他的家產有七千隻羊、三千匹駱駝、五百對牛、五百頭母驢，並且有許多僕婢。這人在全東方的人中至為尊貴。

words.note: A classical term for household servants.
Used as a suffix after a noun to denote 'among' or 'in'.
A formal way to express 'most' or 'to the utmost'.
Often used in religious contexts to describe high status or reverence.

verses.text: 他的兒子素常輪流各按自己的日子在家擺設筵席，並且邀請他們的三個姊妹來一同吃喝。

words.note: A somewhat classical term for 'usually' or 'always'.
A formal term for a banquet.
Refers to sisters generally, or older and younger sisters.
A common V-V compound.

verses.text: 輪流設宴的日子一過，約伯就差人去叫他們自潔。他清早起來，按他們的數目獻上燔祭。因為他心裡想：「說不定孩子犯了罪，心中褻瀆了 神。」約伯經常這樣作。

words.note: Verb-object compound meaning 'to set up a feast'.

words.definition: once passed, as soon as it passed
words.note: 一...就... structure, 'as soon as...then...'
Verb-object compound: 'send a person'.
Verb-object compound: 'self-cleanse' or 'purify oneself'.
Verb + directional complement.
A verb with a directional complement, commonly used for offerings.
A specific type of sacrifice in the Old Testament.
Literally 'cannot say for sure'.
A strong verb implying disrespect towards the sacred.
The space before 神 is a mark of reverence in Chinese Bibles.

verses.text: 有一天， 神的眾子都來侍立在耶和華面前，撒但也來到他們中間。

words.note: The leading space '　' is a reverential formatting in some Bibles.
Refers to angels or children of God.

verses.heading: Satan’s Accusation of Job

verses.text: 耶和華問撒但：「你從哪裡來？」撒但回答耶和華說：「我在地上徘徊，走來走去。」
耶和華問撒但：「你有沒有注意到我的僕人約伯？世上再也沒有一個人像他那樣完全、正直，敬畏 神，遠離罪惡。」

words.note: Used in an A-not-A question structure 'Have you not...?'
Verb complement indicating successful completion.
Often used with negatives like '再也沒有' (no longer, never again).
The leading space '　' is a reverential formatting in some Bibles.

verses.text: 撒但回答耶和華說：「約伯敬畏 神，難道是無緣無故的嗎？

words.note: The leading space '　' is a reverential formatting in some Bibles.
Used in rhetorical questions to express surprise or doubt, expecting a negative answer.
Used at the end of a rhetorical question for emphasis.

verses.text: 你不是在他四周圍上籬笆保護他嗎？他的家和他所有的一切，以及他手所作的，你都賜福，他的家產也在地上增添。

words.note: 不是...嗎 forms a rhetorical question, expecting agreement.
Used for rhetorical questions.
Used here as 'all that he possesses'.
Indicates the following verb is the object of the action; 'that which is V-ed by'.

verses.text: 只要你伸手打擊他所有的一切，他一定當面褻瀆你。」

words.note: A common phrase meaning 'all of everything'
Specifically refers to irreverence towards sacred things.

verses.text: 耶和華對撒但說：「好吧，他所有的一切都交在你手中，只是不可以伸手害他。」於是撒但從耶和華面前退去。
有一天，約伯的兒女正在他們長兄的家裡吃飯喝酒的時候，
verses.heading: Job’s Integrity in Adversity

verses.text: 有報信的來見約伯，說：「牛正在耕田，母驢在附近吃草的時候，

words.note: Refers to 'one who reports news'.

verses.text: 示巴人忽然來侵襲，把牛驢擄去，又用刀殺了僕人，只有我一個人逃脫，來向你報告。」

words.note: Used in the 'bǎ' construction to pre-pose the object.
A specific pairing of animals.

words.definition: carry off, capture and take away
use a sword, with a sword

words.note: Common in ancient contexts, less so in modern daily Chinese.

verses.text: 這個人還在說話的時候，又有人來說：「 神的火從天上降下來，把群羊和僕人都燒光了，只有我一個人逃脫，來向你報告。」

words.note: Refers to God, often with an honorific space in Chinese Bibles.
光 here acts as a resultative complement meaning 'completely'.

verses.text: 他還在說話的時候，又有人來說：「迦勒底人分成三隊突襲駱駝，把牠們擄去，又用刀殺了僕人，只有我一個人逃脫，來向你報告。」

words.note: Also functions as a noun for 'team'.

verses.text: 他還在說話的時候，又有人來說：「你的兒女正在他們長兄的家裡吃飯喝酒的時候，
沒想到有一陣狂風，從曠野那邊颳來，吹襲房屋的四角，房屋倒塌在他們身上，他們就都死了，只有我一個人逃脫，來向你報告。」
於是約伯起來，撕裂外袍，剃了頭，俯伏在地上敬拜，
說：「我赤身出於母胎，也必赤身歸去。賞賜的是耶和華，收回的也是耶和華；耶和華的名是應當稱頌的。」

words.note: Verb followed by a preposition.
Forms a nominal phrase, e.g., 'the one who bestows'.
Forms a nominal phrase, e.g., 'the one who takes back'.
Indicates a state or characteristic, or emphasis.

verses.text: 在這一切事上，約伯並沒有犯罪，也沒有歸咎於 神。

words.note: Functions as a locative suffix, indicating 'in these matters'.
Used before 不/沒 to emphasize negation.
Verb-prepositional phrase acting as a single verbal unit.
The honorific space before 神 is a typesetting convention, not part of the word.
